page.title: 18RECENT EVENTS IN N.FERRIBY.
page.content: { THE QUEEN COMES TO FERRIBY.}In 1981 the Queen arrived in Ferriby,on her way to open the Humber Bridge. She arrived at the station and drove through streets lined with people. { THE ROYAL WEDDING STREET PARTY.}A typical Royal Wedding Street Party was one run by Mrs. Ellingwood down Southfield Drive. Many other parties of this kind were held all over Ferriby. { RECENT EVENTS.}1985 was the 40th anniversary of V.E.Day.The British Legion celebrated by a march of ex-servicemen and a party in the evening.In July there was a Church Garden Fete down Station Road. This was shortly followed by the North Ferriby Horticultural Show, this is a competition for all ages.There was also a Playing Fields Association Village Fete.
